question: World Autism Awareness Day is observed on which date?
explanation: World Autism Awareness Day is an internationally recognized day on 2 April every year. It is designated by United Nations to raise awareness about people with autism throughout the world. The 2018 World Autism Awareness Day observance will focus on the importance of 'empowering women and girls with autism'. Autism is a lifelong neurological condition that manifests during early childhood.
